divs: Sighting Detailsme and my family were on vacation for fourth of july at the river.I remember i was barbecuing facing south when something in my head told me to look up when i did there was amber colered ball of light that kind of was moving side to side i alerted my family and relatives to what was in the sky there was 5 adults and 5 chidren who witnessed along withmyself as for anybody else surrounding us i dont know.the ball was stationary as we all observed it get real bright then disapear for about 1 to 2 seconds then reapeared as triangle shape with 3 lights got bright again disapeared again i said where did it go and it reapeared same triangle shape but the thing was it went from east to west in amatter of seconds.almost like it jumped, it showed it self for a bit then disapeared then what looked like two stars about a football field apart were seen zipping from west to east in a fast speed till they disapeared and me and my fam were left in amazement to what we witnessed and im glad i could report it somewhere.
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Parker
There were no other sightings in Parker on or around July 3rd 2007
